Package com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider

Class CognitoDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider.CognitoDevice
  • public class CognitoDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstraction for a tracked device. A instance of this class represents one tracked device and encapsulates all details for that device. This class provides methods to access the device details. The device attributes are stored as an object of CognitoUserAttributes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description

      Constructs an object of type CognitoDevice with device details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CognitoDevice

        public CognitoDevice​(java.lang.String deviceKey,
                     CognitoUserAttributes deviceAttributes,
                     java.util.Date createDate,
                     java.util.Date lastModifiedDate,
                     java.util.Date lastAccessedDate,
                     CognitoUser user,
                     android.content.Context context)
        Constructs an object of type CognitoDevice with device details.
        Parameters:
        deviceKey - REQUIRED: The device key.
        deviceAttributes - REQUIRED: All devices attributes, stored as a CognitoUserAttributes object.
        createDate - REQUIRED: The date when the device tracking last began.
        lastModifiedDate - REQUIRED: The date on which the device attributes were last modified.
        lastAccessedDate - REQUIRED: The date this device details were last read.
        user - REQUIRED: The CognitoUser this device is linked to.
        context - REQUIRED: App context.

        user - REQUIRED: The CognitoUser this device is linked to.
        context - REQUIRED: App context.

      • getDeviceAttribute

        public java.lang.String getDeviceAttribute​(java.lang.String attributeName)
        Returns the value assigned for a specific attribute for this device. The attribute name is passed as a string. Returns null if this attribute is not set for this device.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - REQUIRED: The name of the attribute whose value is needed.
        Returns:
        value associated with the passed attribute name as a string, returns null if the attribute does not have any value set.

      • getDeviceName

        public java.lang.String getDeviceName()
        Returns the name of this device.
        Returns:
        Name of the device.

      • getCreateDate

        public java.util.Date getCreateDate()
        Returns the date this device was created in the Cognito User Pools, that is the date when the service started tracking this device.
        Returns:
        the date when the device tracking began.

      • getDeviceInBackground

        public void getDeviceInBackground​(GenericHandler callback)
        Fetches device properties. Call this method to ensure the device properties are current. Reading device properties from this object can return null values.
        Parameters:
        callback - REQUIRED: GenericHandler callback.

      • getDevice

        public void getDevice​(GenericHandler callback)
        Fetches device properties, in the current thread. Call this method to ensure the device properties are current. Reading device properties from this object can return null values.

        Note: This method will perform network operations. Calling this method in applications' main thread will cause Android to throw NetworkOnMainThreadException.

        Parameters:
        callback - REQUIRED: GenericHandler callback.

      • forgetDeviceInBackground

        public void forgetDeviceInBackground​(GenericHandler callback)
        Stops tracking this device, runs in a background thread.
        Parameters:
        callback - REQUIRED: GenericHandler callback.
